text: Location of Levoča District in the Prešov Region Nemešany () is a village and municipality in Levoča District in the Prešov Region of central-eastern Slovakia. ==History== In historical records the village was first mentioned in 1570. ==Geography== The municipality lies at an altitude of 482 metres and covers an area of 4.009 km². It has a population of about 353 people. ==External links== *http://www.statistics.sk/mosmis/eng/run.html Category:Villages and municipalities in Levoča District Category:Populated places established in 1570
title: Nemešany
